Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for checking in again and for confirming your continued flexibility (including part-time/phased start).

At present, we still do not have any confirmed withdrawals or newly available sessions in the relevant age room, so there is no change we can confirm since our last update.

In terms of what is *most likely* to become available (when movement does occur), it is typically individual sessions rather than full weeks. Families most commonly adjust or withdraw around:
- the start/end of a month, and
- shortly after funding/working-pattern changes.

If you are able to align to specific days/hours, the options that tend to be easiest for us to place at short notice are:
- 2–3 fixed days per week (rather than 5), and/or
- mid-week days (Tue–Thu) and non-peak pick-up times.

That said, availability is unpredictable, and we can’t promise that any particular pattern will open.

Your details remain on file for rapid contact, and if a suitable opening arises in the appropriate age room (including part-time/phased), we will contact you immediately via the phone/email you provided.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions

conversation.message:
Dear Nursery_E Admissions,

Thank you—happy to confirm the two points:

1) Days among Tue/Wed/Thu: We can take **any two days** among Tue/Wed/Thu (no strict order). If you need a preference, our slight preference would be **Wed + Thu**, but we will accept **any** two of the three to fit your availability.

conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message and for staying in close contact—I've noted again that you can take same-day/next-day single-session cover, a phased start, or any two days among Tue/Wed/Thu, with your flexible hours.

1) **Next-week timing / likelihood of movement:** We can’t reliably predict a specific day, as changes only occur when families formally adjust sessions or withdraw. That said, the times we *most commonly* see movement are:
- **End of the month / start of the next month** (families align schedules and billing), and
- **Shortly after funding/work-pattern changes** (which can happen with little notice).
If you want to be especially on standby, being highly reachable during those windows is helpful—but we still can’t promise movement.

2) **Pre-completing anything now:** Yes, that can help us move quickly if a suitable session opens. If you’re willing, please reply with (or have ready):
- Proof of ID for parent/guardian and proof of address,
- Your child’s birth certificate/passport details,
- Any medical/allergy information and emergency contacts,
- Confirmation that you can attend a **short notice settling/intro visit** (even same/next day) if required.

If an appropriate session becomes available in your child’s age room, we will contact you immediately using your phone/WhatsApp or email.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions

Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for confirming you have completed the secure upload.

• **Upload receipt/attachment to file:** We are not able to provide real-time confirmation by message, but our admissions team will review the secure-upload submissions and attach them to the correct child record. If anything is missing or unclear, we will contact you using the phone/email you provided.

• **Fastest way to secure a session if one opens:** If a suitable session becomes available in your child’s age room and ratios allow, we will typically **call/WhatsApp first** to confirm you can take it. Once you confirm by phone/message, we will then send the **offer/contract link** for e-signature and any required deposit/payment instructions. To hold the place, we generally need **same-day confirmation** and completion of the contract steps promptly (we will specify the exact deadline in the offer message based on how time-sensitive the opening is).

At this time, we still do not have a confirmed opening to offer, but having your documents pre-uploaded will help us move quickly if a same-day/next-day session or phased start becomes available.

Nursery_E Admissions
